oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greene, Polk - Letter 1
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Polk, Trusten; Civil War; correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Trusten Polk, Washington City, to Colton Greene: asks for list of persons that were sent "documents" during the presidential campaign; thinks that secession of some states is inevitable but if so, "where can we go but the south?"; requests Greene's views on these matters.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
